title: Council Decision of 29 June 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 29 June 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (98/C 222/06)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 80/156/EEC of 21 January 1980 setting up an Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, by its Decisions of 23 October 1995 and 16 September 1996 (2), the Council appointed Vassiliki FLOURI a member and Maria NOULA, alternate member of the Committee for the period ending 22 October 1998;
Whereas the Greek Government has nominated Maria NOULA to replace Vassiliki FLOURI and Antiopi GRIVA to replace Maria NOULA,
main_body: Maria NOULA is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives in place of Vassiliki FLOURI, for the remainder of her term of office, which ends on 22 October 1998.

Antiopi GRIVA is hereby appointed alternate member of the Advisory Committee for the Training of Midwives in place of Maria NOULA, for the remainder of her term of office, which ends on 22 October 1998.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 29 June 1998.
For the Council
The President
R. COOK
(1) OJ L 33, 11.2.1980, p. 13.
(2) OJ C 292, 7.11.1995, p. 2, and OJ C 290, 3.10.1996, p. 1.
